name: IX Swap
intro: Decentralized exchange protocol for STOs and TSOs
introduce: IX Swap is the decentralized exchange protocol for STOs and TSOs, the regulatory and liquidity solution for security tokens and tokenized stocks. IX Swap provides liquidity pools and automated market making functions for the STO/TSO industry. The platform facilitates the trading of security tokens through licensed custodians and security brokers which provide actual ownership and claim over these real world assets.
